settings.text: At SilkPar Aesthetics we consider the practice of self-care to be extremely important and understand that it plays a significant role in how we perceive our self-image. At our spa, we form partnerships with our clients in order to find unique solutions to assist them in obtaining their desired skin goals. We recognize that the skin is the largest organ in the body and more often than not is a direct reflection of what may be going on internally. We thoroughly analyze the skin to uncover possible root causes to problem areas and address them with a holistic approach; combined with ethical result driven skincare and advanced treatments to ensure that each client gets the best results, and to maintain the overall health of the skin and the body. The body is more than capable of healing and correcting issues that may be present, but we also acknowledge that at times a little assistance is necessary to achieve certain skin goals. We strive to work in harmony with your body to create that balance both internally and externally to produce longer lasting results.

settings.heading: Self-care on a Whole new Level

settings.text: Our treatment room is where relaxation meets results. There is no need to compromise one for the other. We understand that when it comes to achieving results, properly treating skin cannot be done under a “one size fits all” approach; so all of our facials are customized for each individual according to what their skin may need at the time of appointment. We also apply this same philosophy when it comes to our waxing services. Hair texture and sensitivity levels differ from person to person, so at SilkPar we use more than one wax to achieve the best results for each respective client. We are dedicated to not only ensuring that the treatments and services we offer are results driven, but that the tone and standard for one’s self-care is set and then met.

settings.paragraph: Be the first to know about new collections and exclusive offers.
